channel.title: Arg some1 help me with this error
channel.description:
i got this error make random drops for npcs help me...... it is :
npchandler.java:889: illegal start of expression public int getnpckiller<int npcid> { ^
please help [br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 08:47:15 PM[/size][hr]help me? some1 pl0x

item.title: Arg some1 help me with this error
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Retards… in npchandler.java do ctrl+g and put in 889. Right above that line add a } and press enter after the } you added and add another }. So its like

} } public int getnpckiller<int npcid> {

Read full topic

item.title: Arg some1 help me with this error
item.dc:creator: @c_man123123123 c man123123123
item.description:
@c_man123123123 wrote:

omg plese some1 help.!!! i kno the code needs an extra { some where but i dont kno where!!!i used it like this please help :

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1458) {
if (misc.random2 (8) = 1) {
ItemHandler.addItem(6611, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 2) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1704, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 3) {
ItemHandler.addItem(3204, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 4) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1478, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 5) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1725, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 6) {
ItemHandler.addItem(4087, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 7) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1187, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 8) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1149, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
